org.easybatch.core.api

Interface RecordMapper<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The target domain object type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApacheCommonCsvRecordMapper, DelimitedRecordMapper, FixedLengthRecordMapper, GenericRecordMapper, GsonRecordMapper, JacksonRecordMapper, JdbcRecordMapper, MongoDBRecordMapper, OpenCsvRecordMapper, SpringJdbcRecordMapper, XmlRecordMapper, XstreamRecordMapper

    public interface RecordMapper<T>
    Interface for record mapper. This will be used by the engine to map input record to domain objects.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T mapRecord(Record record)
      Map a record to domain object.

    • Method Detail

      • mapRecord

        T mapRecord(Record record)
            throws RecordMappingException
        Map a record to domain object.
        Parameters:
        record - the record to map.
        Returns:
        an instance of the domain object.
        Throws:
        RecordMappingException - thrown if an exception occurs during record mapping
